instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-03437: What is 820-03437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A No Sound after SMC replacement
threads.message:
Good Day

Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A came for repair. It was badly rusted near SMC so I tried to replace the SMC. But After SMC replacement every thing works fine except sound output. i have tried new speaker and I/O board and SMC reset. I have no idea where to start for this problem. I did visual inspection of <CHIP>U8040</CHIP> and nearby area looks good. 

Thanks in advance for your support.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A No Sound after SMC replacement
threads.message:
I checked voltage at some points, here it is:-

<CHIP>U8040</CHIP>-Pin 6--3.2V
Pin 2,4--1.5V
Pin1,3--1.5V
<SIGNAL>P1V5SOSW_AUDIO_EN</SIGNAL>--3.2V   i think it should be 1.5V f i am not wrong.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A No Sound after SMC replacement
threads.message:
"<SIGNAL>P1V5SOSW_AUDIO_EN</SIGNAL>--3.2V   i think it should be 1.5V"
Do not confuse enable signal with power line!

Did you have sound before SMC replacement?
Be sure to use SMC from donor board, same model.
I recommned you to reball original SMC.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A No Sound after SMC replacement
threads.message:
Thanks for support and guidance.
  I tried it again with a different SMC from donor similar  board.  And it start working everything. Thanks again.  i think previous SMC was from <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-03437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B.  This is my first SMC replacement. Its boom........Great...

Thanks Louis..

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A No Sound after SMC replacement
threads.message:
You're welcome!

BTW, my name is Vali.
